level.text: Public utility companies regulated by the Public Service Commission may remove Special Trees in connection with utility construction, line maintenance, and emergency work within the District’s right-of-way without a Special Tree Removal Permit. Such companies shall comply with the notice requirement set forth in section 105(b) of the Act (D.C. Official Code ยง 8-651.05(b)) and shall comply with ANSI(a)(300) standards.
